desc: Born in 2014, le monde gourmand has become the singular icon of affordable fine fragrance in the us and beyond. With over 1.5M units sold and a cache of cult classics, the addictive perfume and beauty franchise marries fast fashion scents with timeless French minimalism and innovative formulas, all under $30.

layout.text:
Embodying the essence of summer on the Mediterranean with notes of pink sea salt, sugar cane and cyclamen.
Only available while supplies last!
